primary.description: Whether this entry was based on this reference. Primary will have all other values as false.

topo.description: How different the topo is from the original. Higher is more difference. Ranges from -2 to 3.

options.description: Original did not include a topo.
No topo provided.
Topo provided and is an absolute match.
Topo provided and matching for the most part.
Topo has some clear deviations, but looks simular.
Very different topo than what is described, most likely the name carried to another route.

name.description: How different the name is from the original. Higher is more difference. Ranges from -2 to 3.

options.description: Original left out a name.
No name provided.
Name provided and is an absolute match.
Name matching for the most part, minor differences.
Name has changed but there are clear similarities.
The name is entirely different.

grade.description: How different the grade is from the original. Higher is more difference. Ranges from -2 to 3.

options.description: Original did not provide a grade.
No grade provided.
Grade provided and is in the same range.
Grade seems a bit different, could be sandbagged, soft, or different route.
Grade is entirely different, casts doubt on match, or author.

description.description: How different the description is from the original. Higher is more difference. Ranges from -2 to 3.

options.description: Original did not provide a description.
No description provided.
Description provided is a good match for the original.
Description is simular enough to tell it's the same route, but large differences in starts or other details.
Description almost seems like a different route.
Description makes me wonder if this is even the same rock.

location.description: How different the location is from the original. Location just has to do position on maps. Higher is more difference. Ranges from -2 to 3.

options.description: Original did not provide a Location.
No Location provided.
Location provided is a good match for the original.
Location is on the right face and rock but hard to tell. Could be a tad different or different proportions.
Location looks a bit off from the original.
Location is absolutely wrong.

alternative-start.description: If the route is clearly a match but with a different start.

alternative-finish.description: If the route is clearly a match but with a different finish.

notes.description: Notes on why this match was chosen if needed.
